lines.text: My biggest fear is that there is no such thing as PMS and that this is who I really am.
When you name your daughter Rita, you should probably expect a slut.
Laverne, I've just told a ten-year-old boy that he's become a woman!
Then he'll probably be wanting a second opinion
Charley, why do you have beef jerky in your pocket?
Maybe I'm just pleased to see you.
How do you do. I'm Dorothy Zbornak.
Geriatrics is two doors down on the left.

[cooking]
Charley, don't you want to stay for dinner?
I don't know, Barbara. It smells real bad.
I don't wanna change my image at all. I'm happy with who I am.
